Export.Routine:
#include VARConst #include COMSYS
VARSESFarmaciaEspecializada quit
CadastraFarmaciaEspecializada(pLocation) new strStatus, objParams, strLocations set strStatus = 1 set objParams = $get(^VARSESParams(YM,0,1)) set strLocations = $$$VARSESParamsFarmaciaEspecializada(objParams) if ('$$IsFarmaciaEspecializada(pLocation)) { set $$$VARSESParamsFarmaciaEspecializada(objParams) = $$$VARSESParamsFarmaciaEspecializada(objParams) _";"_pLocation set strStatus = $$$Save("VARSESParams",0,objParams,$$$YES) } quit strStatus
IsFarmaciaEspecializada(pLocation) new blnEspecializada, strLocations, objParams, listEspecializadas
set blnEspecializada = 0
set objParams = $get(^VARSESParams(YM,0,1)) set strLocations = $$$VARSESParamsFarmaciaEspecializada(objParams) set listEspecializadas = $LISTFROMSTRING(strLocations,";") set blnEspecializada = $LISTFIND(listEspecializadas,pLocation)
if (blnEspecializada > 0) { quit 1 } else { quit 0 }
IsFormReadOnly() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Disable edit access for locations different from the ones set at VARSESParams ; ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
new objParams, strLocations, strLocation, bolEnable, loop
set bolEnable = 0
set objParams = $get(^VARSESParams(YM,0,1)) set strLocations = $$$VARSESParamsFarmaciaEspecializada(objParams)
for loop=1:1 { set strLocation = $piece(strLocations,";",loop) quit:(strLocation = "") if (strLocation = YLOCATION) { set bolEnable = 1 } }
quit bolEnable
importCID(fileName="c:\tabcid.txt")
new fileStream, line, idCID, CIDDescription, strStatus, idINPARA
$$$VAR
do limparCIDs()
set fileStream = ##class(%FileCharacterStream).%New() set fileStream.Filename = fileName
while 'fileStream.AtEnd {
set line = fileStream.ReadLine()
set idCID = $piece(line, "^", 1) set CIDDescription = $piece(line, "^", 2)
set idINPARA = "VARSESCID"_$$$COMMA_"PT"_$$$COMMA_idCID
set strStatus = $$$Save("INPARA",idINPARA,CIDDescription) }
quit
limparCIDs()
new idioma, id, key, strStatus
$$$VAR
$$$Order3(^INPARA,YM,"VARSESCID",idioma) $$$Order4(^INPARA,YM,"VARSESCID",idioma,id)
set key = "VARSESCID"_$$$COMMA_idioma_$$$COMMA_id set strStatus = $$$Kill("INPARA",key) ;write strStatus,!
$$$End $$$End
quit
// Tirar os . das associações para aproveitar o trabalho feito pelo Paulo. atualizarCIDMedicamento()
new idItem, counter, objCIDMedicamento, strStatus, key
$$$VAR
$$$Order2(^VARSESCIDMedicamento,YM,idItem)
$$$Order3(^VARSESCIDMedicamento,YM,idItem,counter)
set objCIDMedicamento = $get(^VARSESCIDMedicamento(YM, idItem, counter, 1)) set objCIDMedicamento = $translate(objCIDMedicamento, ".", "") set key = idItem_$$$COMMA_counter
set strStatus = $$$Save("VARSESCIDMedicamento",key,objCIDMedicamento,$$$YES)
if $$$ISERR(strStatus) { write "Erro atualizando o cadastro de "_key_" -> "_objCIDMedicamento,! }
$$$End
$$$End
quit
